comments.comment: Hamuduruwane lamai hadanna puluwan kanna denne kawda muslim minissunta palli walin ufawkaranawa. Api danna widiyata muslim palli walin threewill aragena denawa.ratawenuwen jeevithaya nothaka  satan karapu sebalumge deemana kapa hariya.mulim un lamai dahak haduwath kanna denna awun innawa.muslim gani lamayek labenna giyama allanne muslim dr.kenek ape ewun ewa balanawada.? Eka ammata daruwo 4 k wath hadanna kiyanna oni.api srilankikayo widiyata thiyana aya owun usas adhayapanaya kara gena yanna oni.sinhalayanta sinhaloyo bihikara ganna oni.pahug.giya uddedi maruna kollo ganata w.hari yanna kollo kollo hadanna oni.api rajayen illanne yanathanakata hary wadaj karaganna .parliment eke inna ewunge puththu ekekwath uddeta yawanne nahane.un loku unama enne chande illanna.unta igena gaththe nathath prashnayak naha thaththala hidasa puronawane.umta manthree job rka nikanma labenawa.oya parliment eka unta puluwanne lamsi 10 k withara hadala ekek hary hamudawata denna ko kawru hary karala thiuenawada.aduma tharame me sinhala janathawage eka kathirekata watina kamak deela thiyenawada.naha. Wilpaththu kapanne ai simhalayata dennada naha muslim unta denna.ehemai un unge jathiya rakimne.marenna kaliye eka kathire gahapu sinhalaya gana hithanna.sinhalaya kawdawath  mujibarta chande denne naha hodata mathaka thiya ganna obath rakiya apath rakennai me balagathu kathi(x) denne. Eka gahanne pansalakin unata  eke watima kama thama oba hamoma  225 ma ada sura saoa widinne.habai itin
comments.author: Judy Kulathunga

comments.comment: Ane hamuduruwane me paksha Deka kawadawath hadena paksha Dekawa newel. Mun Dan awurudu ganak thisse maruwen maruwata rata kapu Ekai kale. Karanna thiyenne eka deyai. A ape hamuduruwo, gyanasara hamuduruwo athulu ratata adare karana pirisak me rate palanaya athata ganna Ekai.a arenna wena kisi dekin me rata Goda ganna be ape hamuduruwane. Ane meka balanna hamuduruwane. Balala Monawa Hari karanna. Ratata adare minissu tika ekathu karanna. A wisirila thiyena shakthiya ekathu karala Maha Balayak athi karanna ape hamuduruwane.
comments.author: Japan Life

comments.comment:
I would like to request from this Thero to go to Sinhalese, Muslim and Tamil communities too. Talk to people and make them understand the importance of unity in order to bring peace to this country. Please everyone get united. Join hands together!  Save mother Lanka. 
Please convey this message to the Thero.
We are ONE NATION!!
comments.author: D Samara

replies.replyComment: Prasnayata kelin kathakaramuda ' kemakata nethi desapalana arbuda sanwardanaya mawaapemakkda ranga pemakkda ? onama poddekuta therenawa diyunuwa vikurthi kirimak pamanai nokara sadde ? sudussata sudusu thena denna beri bawa therenawaa-apiwa navina wahallu wasyen bendagena godak kall- meaka honda  awasthawek denagenimata apata kathakirime aithiya kawadada lebenne ?Budu dahama anugamanaya karanawa katawath karadarayak nethiwa jiwath unata anagathe idiri anagatha gamana anathurudayakai therenawane ??  (hithanne pathanne) samaya udakaradewa kiya prarrthana karamu .
